thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A perfect stay in Rome
thread.title_full: A perfect stay in Rome - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Philipp612
title: A perfect stay in Rome
text: I have stayed in many Hotels but this was for sure one of the best. The service and kindness of the staff is extraordinary, the breakfast was fantastic ( very good Mozzarella di buffola) and also the Spa was great. The Spa gives you peace and holiday feeling in the centre of rome. The rooftop restaurant is also great, all though a bit more pricey. All in all we spent fantastic 5 days in Rome.
